Alpharetta.Verizon Wireless Amphitheatre at Encore: The Verizon Wireless Amphitheatre at Encore Park is a contemporary amphitheatre, located in the northern Atlanta suburb of Alpharetta, Georgia. The amphitheatre mainly hosts shows by popular music artists, comedians and themed symphony concerts by the Atlanta Symphony Orchestra, the latter opened the venue with a performance on May 10, 2008.
